description.content:
**NOTE:** GoRestEnv

Run Collection Manually concept

Run Collection via CLI

**NOTE:** options after passing collection: --verbose (logs), -r cli, -r html report, -r json, -r junit and simultaneous reports like -r cli,html,json separated by come **without** space as folow:  

postman collection run 18249665-9990c3a8-1538-441c-a7f5-526b436e624b -e 18249665-72401315-6f3f-4ae2-9f72-98cc5529384c --verbose -r html,json

- Log in con Google account a [https://gorest.co.in/](https://gorest.co.in/)
    
- Ve a "REST console" para ver como funcionan los http
    
- Alli tambien se encontrara el JWT Token "Header Value".
    
- El token tambien se encontrara en "Howdy!">"API Tokens"
